website_summaries.verdict: A battery-powered, FDA-approved massager for effective pain relief.
pros: Effective muscle stimulation and pain relief
cons: Some owners say they wish it were even more powerful
Not as easily portable as some other units

customer_reviews.title: I received this product yesterday and it did not work ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this product yesterday and it did not work at at. I replaced the batteries that came with it with new ones and still nothing. Nothing happened at all. And then I find out I cant even get a replacement or refund for an error that came with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Louie L

customer_reviews.title: Works well, no problems. If you anticipate using ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, no problems. If you anticipate using this alot, make sure to get the extra sticky pad electrode things. The stickiness stops working after awhile, so if you are using it daily for a week or two, chances are you will need new electrodes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable! Didn’t work straight out the box.
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT know how it works because it was never used because it doesn’t work straight out of the box. Buyer beware! Don’t buy this! Then I was notified that this product wasn’t returnable.... wait???!!? What???!!!!? Apparently the seller doesn’t take. It hasn’t even been a week and I’m not able to return the product. This is not acceptable!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charisma Douglass

customer_reviews.title: This is the ONLY tens unit for me
customer_reviews.text: I have a pinched sciatica that is causing muscle spasms down my leg and to add insult to injury I had full knee replacement on the same leg as the spasms. I have an older tens unit as well as biofreeze, a hand held massager, hot and cold. My Physical therapy is on hold because the I T band is so tight. I received this new tens unit today and with the first use I feel some relief. GREAT machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A flop all a sudden.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this in the past with good results; however, recently bought two tens unit to use for friends and family. First one stopped working after a week or so. The second one that came with the first one, STRAIGHT OUT of the BOX, only one electrode worked. When you turn on one dial it turns on. When you switch both on, it turns off. Clearly someone messed up some of the connections. Changed batteries, checked connections. Nothing worked and there is a no return or difficult return policy. DO NOT RECOMMEND buying this produce.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan Vo

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Prime Membership
customer_reviews.text: Batteries that came with this At Homes Tens Unit leaked all over inside in less than 1 month of use. I tried to complete return/replace product and it wouldn’t allow me to do to it. Complete waste of money and Prime membership!!! Only reason for 1 Star is system makes reviewer fill in, in order to process review.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these before and loved it ....this was a replacement - still same product .... works wonderfully. Easy to use --- would recommend this to a friend. It has several ways to use and on several parts of your body. I recently had a shoulder problem and after two days of using the product my pain went away.
customer_reviews.author: sheltylady

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Cent!
customer_reviews.text: I threw out my back on Sunday and borrowed a friend’s Tens Unit. Immediately I knew I had to get my own! It arrived on Monday and I’ve used it multiple times a day. I’m feeling so much better and I truly think this pain reliever was a big part of why. Amazing device at a great price. I doubt I’ll ever travel without it! Sorry for sounding like a VISA commercial, but it’s priceless!
customer_reviews.author: MJVA

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time I changed the battery.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. The first time I changed the battery, literally a month after i purchased this, the spring holding battery broke off and it doesn't work. I wrote the seller and there was no reply. Extremely disappointed with this because I have the older model and still use it after several years. One side of the electric massager stopped worker a year ago so i wanted to purchase a new one due to its effectiveness and cost savings.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Kim

customer_reviews.title: Unfair return practices which could be a violation of consumer protection.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pace maker and the instruction says it can not be used if you have a pace maker. I tried returning it but it responded that it is not returnable even if it’s unused and less than 30 days since purchased/delivered. Do you think this is not violating consumer protection act? Amazon should disclose or a warning in the list that this device could not be used by individuals with pace maker.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: A correction for my previous review
customer_reviews.text: I gave a negative review on the Tens I bought, as it turns out I was wrong, I seen 2 ports for the wire & 2 wires. Didn't open them up and see there are 2 pads for each wire., I don't mind admitting when I am wrong but in this case I was wrong. The item is as it is advertised & works good. The pain is gone today.
customer_reviews.author: Grambey

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to deal with knee joint R/A pain. Used while watching TV and after several full cycles, had some noticeable pain reduction and increased range of motion. Effective usage will take some 'trial and error' training cycles and it is possible to get an unpleasant shock from the pads if you mess with them while unit is functioning. Will also take some 'getting used to' the mild electric charge stimuli on normal use. Fully adjustable power settings. Main unit is really TWO sending units with dual controls and pad sets.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G of Troy

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Amazing customer service. I ordered this product back in Feb and it was missing one of the leads - although I didn't realize this; I assumed it only came with one. After following up with them, they responded same day and still honored their product by sending me replacement leads. I struggle with EDS and found this tens machine very easy to use - never had any trouble with it and found some relief with my joint pain. I trust this company and would order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Travis S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it shorts out!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this, it worked great! I used it once a day and noticed an improved difference in my pain. However, 2 months layer, and the wiring has shorted out. One set of pads doesn't work at all, while the other 2 work at about half the strength they used to. I have changed out the bayyeries twice and ot doesnt make a difference on the level or power the unit puts out. There is a electrical issue inside. I wish I could have it fixed, but it is not worth the cost to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine R Nava

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: It works really good for shoulder pain relief. The adhesion pads become not as "sticky" after a few uses. According to my Chiropractor's office, they suggested a "light" spray of Rubbing Alcohol on the pads and put them back on the plastic square piece that was provided in the box. Unless you have someone to place them where needed, then they can slip out of place and if you touch them with your fingers! Ohhhh MY! OUCH! But overall, the best purchase I made for the money especially when on the weekend and my Chiropractor's office is closed. It does the job!
customer_reviews.author: VERY DISSATISFIED!

customer_reviews.title: The best $20 you can spend on a bad back...
customer_reviews.text: ...or any other sore muscle group. This is my 2nd one of these. The fort lasted years of weekly use. It still works, just the connections are getting sloppy. This works every bit as well as the expensive machine at physical therapy! Buy one for you and one for a gift!!
customer_reviews.author: mano

customer_reviews.title: No longer stimulated
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the left and right control buttons. One goes up and the other down....if you are operating it in the dark, you will get confused and turn the wrong button up and get a nice little jolt. It is also a bit larger than the other units available. The unit was working fine up until a few days ago. Now the shocks are weaker and I can barely feel it. I've had better units, that I gave away.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: le3ft channel inop
customer_reviews.text: 1/2 doesn't work, apparently they know this, cannot send back for a refund. AVOID THIS PRODUCT AND SELLER
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wittke

customer_reviews.title: Stimulate and Renew.
customer_reviews.text: As we groe older, we start to have aches and pains. Muscles get weak, because we don't move around like we used to. Found out by using Easy@Home Tens Unit Muscle Stinulator can help strenghten and revitalize those tired old muscles and make them strong again. What a Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Fred W. Bullard

customer_reviews.title: The worst product ever!
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work properly, it doesn't hold it's time. It's supposed to last 15 min.s but it stays on for 8 min.s No wonder they don't allow a return on this product. They don't want their piece of doodoo back.😠
customer_reviews.author: patom

customer_reviews.title: Was good for a while
customer_reviews.text: For a couple months I really enjoyed this, then I noticed that the pulse strengths were weakening. I replaced the pads thinking that was the issue but no, for some reason the two outputs on a cord aren't the same strength. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Have use it for joint pain in my feet, back, elbow and shoulder. Helping on the pain relieve getting to the nerves that make the soreness. It is not a magic wound but helps and you can feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Martinez de Andino

customer_reviews.title: It was the best and turned into the worst
customer_reviews.text: WOW, I have to change my review!!! It just caught fire. I changed the batteries and when I turn-it on, it short circuits and in the inside it starts burning. Big scare. Amazon take this product out. Dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Liccy

customer_reviews.title: First time using this type of device
customer_reviews.text: and I think this was very user friendly. I'll keep using it to see if it helps with my particular issue, but I think it was a good entry device especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: The Golden Darter

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pain relief but beware
customer_reviews.text: The tens unit itself works as it should but the cord somehow has a short in it after two weeks of use. I really hope they are able to replace them free of charge. Also don't forget to get more pads with the order the four that comes with it doesn't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Tierney

customer_reviews.title: Bye,bye,pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh,boy!! Does this ever help the recurring pain I have from calcified tendonitis in my shoulder,neck, and upper arm!! It is very painful,but not with this little beauty. It is also very programmable,and works beautifully. I am just so happy to not having to pay attention to the pain anymore. What a relief.
customer_reviews.author: ellafan

customer_reviews.title: Where do I find replacement pads?
customer_reviews.text: The pads on my unit didn't seem to last too long. I really like the unit and it helped me a lot except for the pads lost their stickiness way too fast. Would like to buy some to replace them and don't know which ones to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Accurso

customer_reviews.title: Too big and clumsy
customer_reviews.text: OK. Didn't think the unit was so big, clumsy, and not very programmable. Never go for the cheapest, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Eric Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I have had a more expensive one and a chess as per one and this one is really all that is needed. Has a lot of features. I bought after it was recommended by a coworker. No issues but I use so frequently I wish I had ordered more pads at the time of purchase. It only comes with 4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: We used this 4-5 times and with 6 weeks it quit working. I replaced the batteries and it still won’t even turn on. Unfortunately I can’t teturn it because that window was a week ago. Very unhappy with this and the 25+$ and now flushed down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong. No returns. Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not a strong unit at all. Wanted to return, but there are no returns for this item. Not a good buy. Wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann Huff

customer_reviews.title: IT SURE BEATS SURGERY.
customer_reviews.text: I have had back pain most of my adult life. Disc surgery was necessary in the past. Now my mostly muscular pain is held in check with 30 minutes, twice daily, as suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey N. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not a pain management treatment
customer_reviews.text: This unit does do what it reads in the description. However it would be used as a temporary, 15 minute massage, not long enough for a real pain reliever. And there are NO Returns. So unfortunately for me, it was a waste of money. I was looking for pain relief, not a massage.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon T

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t turn on at ALL!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and it does not work at all! I thought maybe it was the batteries and it turns out it is NOT the problem at all. I went to try to get ahold of someone about refund or even an exchange and they do NOT do either. I was so happy to finally have something that may help relieve some pain in legs that is chronic but clearly I will have to order from someone else!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Good price and really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best unit ever. Easy to use and it really works. I use it on my feet, sore muscles and hands. Takes pain away in minutes. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Drobny

customer_reviews.title: I like the battery vs charger option on this
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for an earlier one (another company) that failed. I like the battery vs charger option on this. The pads shipped with it are not very good and I ordered some replacement pads which are MUCH better.
customer_reviews.author: JET 1

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: My TENS 7000 unit finally died after 6 years of service and I wanted something more user friendly as a replacement. This model fits the bill. It has 3 manual modes when I simply need immediate relief and preprogrammed modes for preventive maintenance. Loving my new unit!
customer_reviews.author: jahawk7

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver. I use it all the time. There are countless things this is great for. If you feel like you need it just invest in it because it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Colby Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Wish I had purchased earlier. Batteries run out pretty fast.... either that or I just use the heck out of this. My hubby and I share pads at the same time. I should get him his own
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Mart

customer_reviews.title: Amazed at how well it works.
customer_reviews.text: Had a spasm in my right shoulder and neck and it was gone the next day after using this device once. Amazed. Thank you. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: RBrake

customer_reviews.title: Hurts so good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to see if it would help with my shoulder injury. I was surprised that something so small had so much power behind it. I hated the feeling of the pads but they worked so I got over it.
customer_reviews.author: SteaksMom

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Wow-didn’t expect it to have so much power at this low price point. No disappointment here - really does relax my upper back/neck muscles. Saves me money on massage therapy too.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Tens rate a 10 if could
customer_reviews.text: great product. Arrived a bit late but wasnt due to seller rather than delivery system. Hight recommend this product for muscle stiffness and joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: and easily stored for travel
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and easily stored for travel. Only downside I have encountered is that the four AAA's tend to lose power quickly and the dials sometimes get jostled into the on position and drain the batteries. Still very useful as an immediate, on-hand relief for back pain.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: it is just as good as the one I paid 150 for several years ...
customer_reviews.text: the only way I am getting rid if shoulder pain right now. just wish it had a power cord. it is just as good as the one I paid 150 for several years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Back pain saver
customer_reviews.text: It helped me with my bad back pains and took some of the pain away. Used it countless times since my purchase it’s worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Madisonn P

customer_reviews.title: Great device!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this device and it works exactly as promised. I only wish the power intensity levels would be higher than ten. The ten is strong but some of my bigger muscles seem to have little affect.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Marie

customer_reviews.title: The best physical therapy in the comfort of your home
customer_reviews.text: The bomb! This works so well I purchase another for travel! The best physical therapy in the comfort of your home! For nerve pain and back for the whole body! Don’t purchase any over the counter store electric stem product! I learned that the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: RTS-LUV

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Mother. She likes it. Do not try to relocate pads while functioning unless you want to be the laughing stock of near by loved ones.
customer_reviews.author: czrem

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TENS unit to help in labor. I used it once prior to know how to work it... 3 months later when I actually need it, doesn’t work! Batteries inside were leaking fluid. Spend the extra $10 and get a different brand. So disappointed. Total junk
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly O

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: I used this item right out of the package and it works well. I am not sure how long the batteries will last but I find that it is an advantage not to plug it into a wall socket.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good but broken
customer_reviews.text: My parents have this product and I have used it many times for the muscles in my back. It worked very well so I decided to get one for myself. Unfortunately one of the plugs on mine does not back so I can only plug in one set of pads at a time. It's very upsetting. So it's good if you get a good one, but I did not.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Doesn't fully operate.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Batteries received with unit were dead upon arrival. After purchasing a trusted brand of batteries, I plugged everything in and applied the adhesives to my back and legs. Only one of the leads outputs work. Such a disappointment, and there is no information on how to return and our receive a replacement. I do not recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to doctor and patient
customer_reviews.text: I have given many kinds of tens unit to patients. Most of tens machines are hard to use, especially to aged patient. This machine is very easy to explain, easy to use. And many patients like it. The only thing which needs to fix is that the electric pad is not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Chul H. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Adequate.
customer_reviews.text: Good for muscle pain relief, but I bought it for nerve pain relief and there are no continuous modes for that. Good item for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Kailholz

customer_reviews.title: The hand control is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The hand control is easy to use. Comes with 4 separate attachable pads rather than only 2, which is nice for multiple areas. Seems to work well, is even better when the pads are cleaned. There is also a speed control besides the intensity control knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Was a great Christmas gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: Gave this one as a Christmas gift to my son because I love the one I bought for myself. He has used this one and says it is wonderful for his lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Do not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money, its not very strong. Even on the highest setting could barely feel it. But guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: A. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: great muscle stimulator. it has multip.e settings for what ever type application you may need and is adjustable to your sensitivity. great price also!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ceelo

customer_reviews.title: Tens Unit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a MUST for me. Can't live without it. Saved me many trips to the doctor. I use it for my back, carpal tunnel and it WORKS. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for the whole body!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is from the gods! Give yourself the pain relief of a masseuse! So good!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Freeman

customer_reviews.title: five stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely can't say enough great things about it. I t has 3 diff modes and my favorite is kneading. I don't know how it works but it's wonderful. I had one small issue with the electrode pads, they weren't sticky enough and they were smaller than the average size. Customer service was very helpful with this issue. yes I would by another for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Good machine I use it for my back pain helps
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this can make my husband feel labor pains because I read some of the reviews DO NOT buy if you want to use it for that lol
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Try every function
customer_reviews.text: At first I only used the massage and knead options. But it's worth letting it stay on default. I have tense shoulders and back pain from a car accident. It helps me relax.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Non-functional and not eligible for refund
customer_reviews.text: Product appeared to turn on but no sensation felt through pads. I bought different pads and batteries but received same result. Not eligible for return due to amazon policy. What a waste of money. I highly recommend anyone spend a little more and get a quality unit or you’ll be disappointed and in pain like me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tens machine
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, I use these on a regular basis. I have low back issues & I use this in between Chiropractor visits
customer_reviews.author: soldiermom

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Its ok the adhesive really does suck! I wish there were more pads but the "knead" and the "beat" feel like a taser!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Chaira

customer_reviews.title: Your person  At Home treatment for sore muscles.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job of stimulating the muscles and relieving the pain in my shoulder with the torn rotator cuff. The problem I have is that the electrical cords keep coming out of the TENS unit. I would buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: Beachdog7

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: I had a hip replacement and this unit has helped with nerve and muscle weakness. I wish it came with a placement diagram.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so easy to use I would highly recommend it to relieve pain and get rid of soreness if you are an athlete or just in person in pain
customer_reviews.author: jesus

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase, is non returnable.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all even after put new batteries in & triple checked all connections.
customer_reviews.author: eleni

customer_reviews.title: Feel good
customer_reviews.text: This unit works amazingly. I was not expecting it to work so well. I have Rheumatoid arthritis and used it on my shoulder after a flare one day and the next day the pain was not even close to what it was the day before.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Anderson

customer_reviews.title: jUST WHAT i NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: tHIS UNIT MEETS MY NEEDS AND IS EASY TO USE. i WOULD RECOMMEND IT FOR ANYONE WHO HAS A NEED FOR PAIN RELIEF.
customer_reviews.author: glenn sterrett

customer_reviews.title: Must have one
customer_reviews.text: Good for hurt bones back legs arms I like this alot lot
customer_reviews.author: Ajgbjl

customer_reviews.title: Relief from back pain
customer_reviews.text: Best for the money, operates very easy and it helps tremendously with muscle spasms And relaxes your lower back, laidback, shoulders etc. Highly recomended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for those who like Force
customer_reviews.text: If you are the type of person who prefers soft water when taking a shower, this is definitely for you. There's no force or anything with this even after increasing the speed and trying the Auto Procedures. One of the pads fell off after a minute or so of being on.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Thank you very much
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes this very much she said it works very good
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Jones Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great but controls could be improved
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works well, but controls are not the best. Some settings are not intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work great and she has used it a lot in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an early mother's day gift for my wife and she loves it so far - 5 stars for that. It seems to work great and she has used it a lot in the first few days. The only issue I noticed is it is difficult to get the batteries out, a pull strap or something would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, nothing could be better. Go it it for a senior-citizen friend who loves it and uses it daily for chronic pain. Easy to read. Easy to use and it definitely works exactly like a tens machine. He is low-income and this is a perfect alternative to an expensive tens that his insurance will not provide.
customer_reviews.author: Buddhatravels

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I just wish it came with replacement pads ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend who has carpal tunnel. It works great. I just wish it came with replacement pads because they get worn out after a while.
customer_reviews.author: BobbieSocks369

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and on the recommendation of physical therapist, I decided to try the tens unit and found it did help with my pain.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Can't do with out it
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist let me know that this was one of the best at the price I just love my tens it has helped me I use it 3 times a day
customer_reviews.author: GG02

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: I found the device to work as well, as the one in the doctors office. It was easy to assemble and the instructions for its use clear. The price was fair and delivery time amazing. I was more than pleased with the device and price.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my son for severe back pain ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for severe back pain.He felt relief right away and was able to stand straight and walk immediately We're excited!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: You get bang for your buck nperfect for at home. Worked better than at PT
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lemke

customer_reviews.title: not powerful
customer_reviews.text: not powerful enough. has a weird pause while in use. I'm stuck with the crap no refund
customer_reviews.author: MBshopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy@Home TENS Unit
customer_reviews.text: The unit came exactly as described and works well. It is actually a little bigger than the picture looks. Although two people can use the unit, I was a little disappointed that you can't enjoy two different settings simultaneously. If you have never used this type of machine, it make take a second to get used to the sensation but after the initial 'shock', it feels great and really helped ease my back tension! Pros * Multiple settings * Multiple user * Reusable pads * Price * FDA appoved Cons * One setting for two users * Larger than expected * No case for unit
customer_reviews.author: quelsplace

customer_reviews.title: TENS, UNIT MUSCLE STIMULATOR
customer_reviews.text: YES THE ELECTRIC SHOCK UNIT WORKS, SO FAR JUST FINE. THE MOST I CAN TAKE IS #4,GOING TO # 10 SETTING WOULD PROBLEY REALLY HURT?? I'M GLAD I BOUGHT THIS UNIT.
customer_reviews.author: Pete K. Hentges

customer_reviews.title: Use three times and break down....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it last October and used it three times and want to use it again today but it doesn't work. It sounds like something has fallen inside. What to reorder ....
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: bought this tens unit to help with neuropathy pain and ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this tens unit to help with neuropathy pain and it helps ease it a bit; just remember that everyone is different and what works for me, might not be right for you. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Poi dragon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t offer nearly as much relief as other tens units I’ve tried. On my calves and ankles, it increased the pain.

customer_reviews.title: Came very well packaged and worked easily following the directions
customer_reviews.text: Came very well packaged and worked easily following the directions. Purchased for my elderly father who has shoulder issues to see if it would offer him some relief. Has only used it 3 times so far, but he liked it and found it easy enough to work himself

customer_reviews.text: This is great for shoulders, neck, back middle, upper and lower. Wonder device & control!

customer_reviews.title: What I liked the most is that it is very simple to ...
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most is that it is very simple to use, especially for older people. And it feels great! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Enchanted

customer_reviews.title: Batteries required!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Requires batteries, and controls are confusing. Oversized it's just not a good choice.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well when it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well initially, simple to operate .But very disappointedly stopped worked even before the electrodes lost their adhesive. Granted it was cheap, but it should have lasted longer then a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is a place to go on a budget.

customer_reviews.title: Works but not convenient
customer_reviews.text: The electrodes for this unit we're very sticky but hard to get a hold of too remove. The unit is very bulky. Had to use a fanny pack to carry it with me.

product_meta.title: Easy@Home TENS Unit Muscle Stimulator - Electronic Pulse Massager, 510K Cleared, FSA Eligible OTC Home Use handheld Pain Relief therapy Device - Pain Management Machine - EHE009
feature_bullets: "Relieve your pain with Easy At Home”. Easy@Home TENS Handheld Electronic Pulse Massager Unit relieves the Muscle Soreness, Stiffness, or Chronic Pain on the Shoulder, Waist, Joint, Back, Arm, Leg and more. ** Our Guarantee- We are so confident that you will love this product that we offer a 1 Year PRODUCT Quality Guarantee.**
Effective and Safe to use - for OTC home use, pain relief therapy device. Proven natural method to relieve the pain without medicine. Powered by 4 AAA batteries (Included).

Easy to use: Large LCD screen shows you at a glance exactly what is happening, including the type of massage "Massage, Beat, or Knead" and the time left on the cycle. It's fully automatic! . Programmatic Patterns of Stimulation with 6 Auto Procedure Options and 10 Levels for Power Intensity knobs. Pulse Stimulation Speed adjustable.
Relieve the pain at many areas such as back, shoulder, arm, leg and joint etc. 4 Electrode Pads application simultaneously. (4 pcs Electrode Pads included).

*** DO NOT use the product if you have a cardiac pacemaker or an existing cardiac condition, implanted metal devices/screws areas of the body, pregnant or suffer from epilepsy. If you have one of the following conditions, please consult with your physician. Any acute disease; tumor; infectious disease; pregnant; heart disease; high fever; abnormal blood pressure; lack of skin sensation or an abnormal skin condition; any condition requiring the active supervision of a physician. ***
